title: PM to announce big relief for masses, business community: Marriyum
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 23 (APP): Minister for Information and Broadcasting Marriyum Aurangzeb Aurangzeb said on Tuesday that Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif would announce a big relief for the masses and businessmen shortly.
This she said using her twitter handle.
وزیراعظم شہباز شریف کچھ دیر بعد عوام اور تاجروں کے لئے بڑے ریلیف کا اعلان کریں گے۔
